financial_benefits.description: Bulgaria has a flat income tax rate of 10%, one of the lowest in the EU.
The cost of living in Bulgaria is relatively low compared to other EU countries.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Bulgaria offers diverse landscapes including mountains, beaches, and natural parks.
With a long history, Bulgaria has many cultural and historical sites to explore.

additional_benefits.description: Many Bulgarians, especially younger people, speak English.
Bulgarians are known for their hospitality and friendliness towards foreigners.

key_consideration: The Bulgarian Remote Work Visa allows digital nomads to live and work in Bulgaria with favorable tax conditions.
action_comment: Consider Bulgaria for its low cost of living, low taxes, and beautiful nature.
tagline: Experience affordable European living in Bulgaria.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you stay for longer than 183 days in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: The visa can be extended based on continued employment or contract work.

income_requirement.misc_details: Applicants must demonstrate sufficient funds to support themselves during their stay.

application_fee.details: Fee covers the main applicant and any dependents.

visas.renewability_details: The visa can be extended based on continued eligibility.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Digital nomad visa does not lead to permanent residency.

special_regimes.name: Digital Nomad Visa
special_regimes.benefit: No income tax on foreign-sourced income.
eligibility: Proof of employment, self-employment, or freelance work that can be done remotely.
Valid police clearance from the past 6 months.
Health insurance covering the duration of stay.

required_documents: Valid police clearance from the past 6 months
